name: Hillbilly Name Generator
description: Yeehaw! Need a name that screams 'born in the holler'? Our Hillbilly Name Generator's got you covered. Perfect for your next character, moonshine brand, or just a good ol' laugh!
introduction: Ever wonder what you'd be called if you were raised on a steady diet of cornbread and banjo music? This here generator will spit out authentic-soundin' hillbilly names faster than you can say 'fetch me my shotgun!' Get ready to embrace your inner mountain folk!
howToUse: Click that fancy 'Generate' button. Go on, you know you wanna.
Feast your eyes on the glorious hillbilly name bestowed upon you.
Don't like it? Click again, ya city slicker! We got plenty more where that came from.
Share your newfound hillbilly identity with your friends. Hilarity WILL ensue.

faqs.question: Are these names *actually* authentic hillbilly names?
faqs.answer: Well, bless your heart! We've crafted these names to *sound* like authentic hillbilly names. We can't guarantee your great-grandpappy actually knew someone named 'Ezekiel Thunderbottom,' but it's plausible!

faqs.question: Can I use these names for my Dungeons & Dragons character?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Imagine the look on your party's faces when 'Cletus the Conjurer' rolls up. Just be prepared to explain what a 'conjurer' is to Cletus.

faqs.question: Is this generator offensive?
faqs.answer: We aim for humor, not harm. If you're easily offended, maybe stick to generating names for your pet goldfish. Otherwise, lighten up and enjoy the fun!

faqs.question: Will using a hillbilly name improve my moonshine-making skills?
faqs.answer: While we can't guarantee it, we reckon it couldn't hurt! There's somethin' about a name like 'Billy-Bob' that just screams 'expert distiller'.

faqs.question: Can I suggest names to add to the generator?
faqs.answer: We're all ears! Send your suggestions our way. If we like 'em, we might just add 'em in... and give you a shout-out, too!

faqs.question: Is this generator free?
faqs.answer: Free as the mountain air! Use it to your heart's content.
